info.description: This is the documentation for the Jama REST API. Visit our Developer portal for best practices (cookbook), policies, sunset/migrations status.
info.title: Jama REST API

get.summary: Search for items, test plans, test cycles, test runs, or attachments

parameters.name: createdDate
parameters.description: Filter datetime fields after a single date or within a range of values. Provide one or two values in ISO8601 format (milliseconds or seconds) - "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ" or "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ"

parameters.name: modifiedDate
parameters.description: Filter datetime fields after a single date or within a range of values. Provide one or two values in ISO8601 format (milliseconds or seconds) - "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ" or "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ"

parameters.name: lastActivityDate
parameters.description: Filter datetime fields after a single date or within a range of values. Provide one or two values in ISO8601 format (milliseconds or seconds) - "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ" or "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ"

parameters.name: contains
parameters.description: Filter on the text contents of the item. Strings taken literally. Multiple 'contains' values will be bitwise ORed.

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort orders can be added with the name of the field by which to sort, followed by .asc or .desc (e.g. 'name.asc' or 'modifiedDate.desc'). If not set, this defaults to sorting by sequence.asc and then documentKey.asc

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: If not set, this defaults to 20. This cannot be larger than 50

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Links to include as full objects in the linked map

get.summary: Get the  snapshot of the item at the specified version

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Links to include as full objects in the linked map

get.summary: Get the numbered version for the item with the specified ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Links to include as full objects in the linked map

get.summary: Get all versions for the item with the specified ID

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: If not set, this defaults to 20. This cannot be larger than 50

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Links to include as full objects in the linked map

get.summary: Get all versioned relationships that were associated to the item at the specified time

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Get relationships for the specified item at this date and time. Requires ISO8601 formatting (milliseconds or seconds) - "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ" or "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ"

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: If not set, this defaults to 20. This cannot be larger than 50

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Links to include as full objects in the linked map

get.summary: Get any item, test plan, test cycle, test run, or attachment with the specified ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Links to include as full objects in the linked map

get.summary: Get all activities in the project with the specified ID

parameters.name: eventType
parameters.description: Event type to filter on. More than one event type can be chosen

parameters.name: objectType
parameters.description: Object type to filter on. More than one object type can be chosen

parameters.name: itemType
parameters.description: ID of item type to filter on. More than one item type can be chosen

parameters.name: date
parameters.description: Filter datetime fields after a single date or within a range of values. Provide one or two values in ISO8601 format (milliseconds or seconds) - "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ss.SSSZ" or "yyyy-MM-dd'T'HH:mm:ssZ"

parameters.name: deleteEvents
parameters.description: Get item delete events only

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: If not set, this defaults to 20. This cannot be larger than 50

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Links to include as full objects in the linked map

get.summary: Get all activities at the admin level

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: If not set, this defaults to 20. This cannot be larger than 50

parameters.name: filterTerm
parameters.description: Filter on the text contents of the activities. Strings in quotations taken literally. Multiple values will be treated as separate tokens for matching.

parameters.name: projectId
parameters.description: Filter by Project ID. User must be at least Project Administrator

get.summary: Get all items affected by the activity with the specified ID

parameters.name: maxResults
parameters.description: If not set, this defaults to 20. This cannot be larger than 50

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Links to include as full objects in the linked map

post.summary: Restore item(s) associated with a delete activity.

get.summary: Get the activity with the specified ID

parameters.name: include
parameters.description: Links to include as full objects in the linked map

put.summary: Update the location for the item with the specified ID as an asynchronous request (a successful response signifies that the work was started and a work identifier is given. This identifier will be used in a future feature). Any child items are moved along with this item. Note that this currently only supports moving items between projects

get.description: Must include at least one query parameter from testCycle, testCase, or testPlan

parameters.description: Filter by test runs from test case id

parameters.name: testPlan
parameters.description: Filter by test runs in test plan id

parameters.name: sortBy
parameters.description: Sort orders can be added with the name of the field by which to sort, followed by .asc or .desc (e.g. 'name.asc' or 'testCycle.desc'). If not set, this defaults to documentKey.asc.

scopes.token_information: main scope for using Jama REST API

resources.description: A set of resources and allowed permissions

fields.description: A map of field names to field values e.g. {"name":"Sample Item", "status": 292, "release": 2, "assigned": 23}

globalSortOrder.description: The relative position of an item within its project. Deprecated. Use sequence instead.

currentVersion.description: Currently active version of the versioned item. If no version is active, currentVersion will not be returned.

versionedItem.description: Item ID and version number for a versioned item

sourceName.description: Name of the source that the baseline is part of

source.description: ID of the source that the baseline is part of

sourceKey.description: Key of the source that the baseline is part of

signed.description: Is true when the baseline has a signature

source.description: ID of the source that the baseline is part of

resources.description: A set of resources and allowed permissions

fields.description: A map of field names to field values e.g. {"name":"Sample Item", "status": 292, "release": 2, "assigned": 23}

item.description: Item ID and version number for an item

category.description: Used to set the Category of the Item Type if it has special behavior.

globalId.description: Must use override if you want to set this value on POST.

project.description: Only required when creating a new item (POST).

fields.description: A map of field names to field values e.g. {"name":"Sample Item", "status": 292, "release": 2, "assigned": 23}

parent.description: This can point to either a project or a parent item at which this item is located, not both.

item.description: ID of an item. If this is included, the item of this payload will be located at this parent item. If this is not included, the item will be located at the root of the project.

project.description: ID of an project. If this is included, the item of this payload will be located at the root of the project, and a parent item cannot be specified. This value will be inferred by the "project" property at the root of the payload when a parent location is not specified.

currentVersion.description: Currently active version of the versioned item. If no version is active, currentVersion will not be returned.

resources.description: A set of resources and allowed permissions

fields.description: A map of field names to field values e.g. {"name":"Sample Item", "status": 292, "release": 2, "assigned": 23}

newStatus.description: ID of a pick list option

fields.description: A map of field names to field values e.g. {"name":"Sample Item", "status": 292, "release": 2, "assigned": 23}

projectKey.description: Not Required if isFolder is true

fields.description: A map of field names to field values e.g. {"name":"Sample Project", "status": 292, "release": 2, "projectManager": 23}

relationshipType.description: Relationships will be created with the default type when providing a null or invalid relationship type

testCaseVersionNumber.description: The version of the test case at the time of test run creation

testCaseCurrentVersionNumber.description: The current version of the test case that the test run is based on

sortOrderFromTestGroup.description: The sort order within the test group at the time of test cycle creation

testGroup.description: ID of a test cycle and ID of a test group

A map of field names to field values e.g. {"name":"Sample Item", "startDate": "2015-01-01", "endDate": "2015-01-15"} Note: RequestTestCycle requires name, startDate, and endDate. startDate and endDate are formatted with 'yyyy-mm-dd'

testRunGenerationConfig.description: Settings for how test runs will be generated in this test cycle

testGroupsToInclude.description: The Test Group IDs of the Test Groups from which you would like to generate Test Runs. Do not specify anything to include all groups.

testRunStatusesToInclude.description: Only valid after generating the first Test Cycle, you may choose to only generate Test Runs that were a specified status in the previous cycle. Do not specify anything to include all statuses

username.description: Required when creating a new user (POST). Optional on update (PUT)

password.description: Required when creating a new user (POST). Not valid on update (PUT)

firstName.description: Required when creating a new user (POST). Optional on update (PUT)

lastName.description: Required when creating a new user (POST). Optional on update (PUT)

email.description: Required when creating a new user (POST). Optional on update (PUT)

licenseType.description: Required when creating a new user (POST). Optional on update (PUT)

authenticationType.description: Required when creating a new or update user (POST or PUT), when the authentication mode is Basic+IdP
